articles.title: About this site
articles.contents:
I am a second-year PhD student in statistics at UC Irvine. I previously received a B.S. in Mathematics-Computer Science at UC San Diego in 2019.
I can be reached at ewongtoi[at]uci[dot]edu.

articles.title: Eliot Wong-Toi
articles.description: Welcome to my website. I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents:
I am a second-year PhD student in statistics at UC Irvine. I previously received a B.S. in Mathematics-Computer Science at UC San Diego in 2019.
I can be reached at ewongtoi[at]uci[dot]edu.

articles.title: Research
articles.description: Some additional details about my research experience.
articles.contents:
UC Irvine
Micro-Randomized Trials with Binary Outcomes
Summary: Co-wrote mrtbincalc package (to be posted on CRAN) and shiny app for power and sample size calculations for micro-randomized trials with binary outcomes.

Radiomics
Summary: Collaborated with UC Davis scientists on analyzing radiomic data for predicting skin cancer.

UC San Diego
Medical Imaging
Summary: Implemented convolutional neural network for image segmentation on MRI’s of lungs in the UCSD Pulmonary Imaging Lab under the direction fo Prof. Rui Carlos Pereira de Sa.
